sub_title: Senior CAE - FEM Specialist (FEA / FEM) in R&D Dept at Continental - ContiTech Vibration Control Slovakia
summary:
I am a FEM/FEA expert with 7+ years of experience globally in working as FEM Structural Analysis Engineer. I have worked as a Global R&D FEM team member and acquired rich experience in handling FEM simulation projects. Presently, I am associated with Continental – ContiTech Vibration Control Slovakia | FEM Specialist | Since Jul 2017. 

As a Project specialist, I enjoy a proven track record in completing FEM projects across Europe with substantial cost savings and exceeded customer expectations by meeting the quality standards.  My key areas of forte are handling Static, Dynamic & Durability (Rubber, Polyamide and metal parts) FEM simulations, FE Meshing, Topology optimization, etc. I have  profound knowledge of FEM, Engine & transmission mounts, HVAC unit, heat exchangers, CFD and materials.

Best known for my functional expertise and my collaborative competencies, having worked with R&D Team, design team, internal/external & OEM customers for fulfilling the project pre-requisites. I am experienced in FEM projects capacity management of Team, undertaken knowledge sharing sessions as a Sr. Technical Support & Trainer.

With a strong multi-geographic exposure of working in countries like Slovakia, Germany and India, I have experience in developing project roadmaps, implementing best practices and driving process improvement initiatives. I am technically deft in using ABAQUS software– FEA solver, Hypermesh – the 3D meshing of rubber parts, HyperView, HyperLife, OptiStruct and CATIA V5 (advanced level).

For knowing more about me, drop me a line on LinkedIn or shravanmech.gajul@gmail.com
